name: The Boulevard Chair - Davidson
description: Part of DAVIDSON's West Coast Collection, the Boulevard is a chic and exciting armchair that celebrates best of bold, daring 70s-inspired furniture design and is an exceptionally comfortable seat for your home. Fully upholstered in a smart and confident shade of coral wool by Holland & Sherry, the curvaceous yet unobtrusive tub-like form of this armchair makes it surprisingly easy to integrate into a range of interiors. Whether it be a room rooted in sleekly minimal decor, where the chair would provide a powerful pop of colour, or a busier room scheme of playful patterned textiles and characterful furniture choices, the Boulevard represents an original and exciting addition to your home. As with other DAVIDSON chairs, the Boulevard can be upholstered in a range of fabrics or leathers to suit your interior.
